description: Opinion and Order:  In this proceeding, the term "expert system(s)" as used in the '392 patent will be given the construction:  "a computer program consisting of (1) a database module that contains information a specialist would  consider in an analysis of an equipment operator for impairment; (2) a decision module that applies logic for screening and testing an equipment operator for impairment and for controlling equipment, and (3) an interface module which interfaces with  one or more equipment modules and the equipment operator."  The remaining contested terms of the '392 patent are sufficiently clear without any additional construction.  This case is set for a hearing on status on October 9, 2014 at 2:00 p.m.  Signed by the Honorable William T. Hart on 9/18/2014:Mailed notice(clw, )
